FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ):
FAQ.desc: The CDL Help Partner Program connects CDL schools with motivated students who are preparing to obtain their licenses. Below, we’ve provided detailed answers to the most common questions about the program:

JoinPartnerProgram.title: How do I join the CDL Help Partner Program?
JoinPartnerProgram.desc:
Joining is quick and easy. Simply fill out a short registration form and provide basic information about your school. Once submitted, our team will verify:

  • Your school’s address and contact details
  • Your readiness to accept new students
  • Your school’s registration status with the FMCSA

ReceiveConfirmation.title: When will I receive confirmation?
ReceiveConfirmation.desc:
Within three business days, a CDL Help manager will contact you to:

  • Confirm your school’s information
  • Discuss next steps after your free trial
  • Answer any questions you may have about the program

HowActivationWork.title: How does activation work?
HowActivationWork.desc:
Once your application is approved:

  • Your school will be listed in the CDL Help network
  • You’ll gain access to an easy-to-use dashboard for managing leads and tracking performance

LeadGenerationWork.title: How does lead generation work?
LeadGenerationWork.desc:
Motivated students looking for CDL training can now easily find your school through the CDL Help app. Here’s how it works:

  • Students open the “Schools” section
  • They fill out a short form with their city and state
  • A lead request is automatically sent to your dashboard

StartReceivingLeads.title: When will I start receiving leads?
StartReceivingLeads.desc:
Leads will begin appearing in your dashboard and via push notifications right after activation. Each lead includes:

  • The student’s location
  • Submission timestamp
  • An option to send a direct invite to the student

AfterActivation.title: What happens after activation?
AfterActivation.desc:
As a new partner, you’ll receive 2 months of free access. During this period, you can:

  • Invite students who meet your school’s criteria
  • Contact students directly via our integrated system using your phone number
  • View call analytics and monitor performance inside your dashboard

BenefitsForSchool.title: How does the CDL Help Partner Program benefit my school?
BenefitsForSchool.desc:
The CDL Help Partner Program allows your school to:

  • Find new students faster
  • Easily connect with interested and motivated applicants in your area
  • Increase enrollment rates by receiving only high-quality, pre-qualified leads
  • Boost your sales efficiency and improve conversion rates

Promo.title: Submit a request now and receive leads for free for 2 months

Footer.mobile-app: Mobile app for iOS and Android with CDL tests and translation capability
